de.tubs.cs.iti.krypto.protokoll
Class Certificate

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--de.tubs.cs.iti.krypto.protokoll.Certificate
public class Certificate
extends java.lang.Object

This is a data class modelling a certificate to be issued by the TrustedAuthority-class.
Its methods allow access to ID, data and signature of a certificate.

See Also:
TrustedAuthority

Constructor Detail

Certificate

public Certificate(java.lang.String ID,
                   byte[] data,
                   java.math.BigInteger signature)
Instantiates a new Certificate object with the given parameters. This constructor is called by TrustedAuthority to generate certificates.
Parameters:
ID - the ID-String of the certificate
data - the data contained in the certificate (e.g. a key of a public key kryptosystem)
signature - the signature on ID and data that is computed by the trusted authority
